code:
```verilog
[BEGIN]
module TopModule (
    input logic [7:0] in,  // 8-bit signed input
    output logic [31:0] out // 32-bit signed output
);

    always @(*) begin
        out = {{24{in[7]}}, in};  // Sign extension
    end

endmodule
[DONE]
```

issues: Numeric constants should have explicit size (e.g., 1'b0 not 0)
